content: most patterns written for self-striping yarns use an afterthought heel which looks great but for those of us with a high instep doesn t always provide the best fit this is how i knit my self-striping socks the gusset/heel flap combined with a flk provides a little extra room for that perfect fit **important ** this pattern incorporates the fish lips kiss 1 heel you can purchase the pattern for $1 through ravelry if you do not already own it if you prefer a short row heel or a sweet tomato heel you could substitute 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/fish-lips-kiss-heel
